overview: Shot between 1962 and 1963, this film takes place in a cyclical time during which a day of the urban daily life of Bogot치 and its inhabitants is presented in the early 60s of the last century, from one dawn to another dawn, amalgamating the images with the musicalization of Rhapsody in Blue and An American in Paris by George Gershwin.
title: Rhapsody in Bogot치
